h2_title: Where to use the Past Echo in Black Myth: Wukong
content: As you progress through the Lower Hollow in The Webbed Hollow (after defeating the Venom Daoist twice), you will eventually fight Zhu Bajie"). During this fight, which consists of two phases, the Past Echo Key Item in your inventory will automatically be used.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Past_Echo.md', within the main section titled 'Past Echo', specifically from the subsection 'Where to use the Past Echo in Black Myth: Wukong'.
The content is as follows:
As you progress through the Lower Hollow in The Webbed Hollow (after defeating the Venom Daoist twice), you will eventually fight Zhu Bajie"). During this fight, which consists of two phases, the Past Echo Key Item in your inventory will automatically be used.
